name: task-orchestrator
description: Task-Orchestrator is a local-first app that turns vague ideas into clear, actionable plans using a FastAPI backend and a Next.js frontend. It refines goals, breaks them into tasks, and generates step-by-step strategies entirely on your machine.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n LLM,API,WEB -c blue,green,magenta "npm run llm" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
